One/CD of/IN the/DT best/JJ ways/NN to/TO experience/NN such/IN a/DT deGYUstation/NN is/VBZ to/TO dine/VB Yakiniku/NNP style/NN ./. When/WRB I/PRP was/VBD in/IN Tokyo/NN recently/RB ,/, my/PRP$ friend/NN Hisato/VBZ brought/VBN me/PRP to/TO a/DT Yakiniku/NNP restaurant/NN and/CC we/PRP literally/RB ate/VBD every/DT part/NN of/IN the/DT cow/NN including/IN the/DT Naizou/NN -LRB-/NN innards/VBZ -RRB-/RB ./. In/IN Singapore/NNP ,/, not/RB only/RB is/VBZ there/RB a/DT restriction/NN on/IN the/DT importation/NN of/IN innards/VBZ ,/, most/NN Yakiniku/NNP restaurants/NNS only/RB bring/VBN in/IN selected/CD parts/NNS of/IN the/DT cow/NN ./. So/CC most/RB of/IN us/PRP would/MD be/VB more/RB familiar/JJ with/IN the/DT popular/JJ cuts/NNS like/IN Ribeye/NN ,/, Sirloin/NN and/CC Short/NN Rib/NN ./. The/DT opportunity/NN for/IN my/PRP$ deGYUstation/NN arose/NN when/WRB my/PRP$ friend/NN Shinji/NN informed/VBD me/PRP that/WDT Magosaburou/NNP actually/RB imports/IN the/DT whole/JJ cow/NN for/IN their/PRP$ restaurant/NN ./. According/VBG to/TO the/DT people/NN at/IN Magosaburou/NNP ,/, their/PRP$ Wagyu/NN experts/NN went/VBD all/RB around/IN Japan/NNP looking/VBG for/IN the/DT best/JJS Wagyu/NN and/CC finally/RB chose/JJ Kurohana/NNP Wagyu/NNP from/IN Kumamoto/NNP prefecture/NNP -LRB-/NNP Kyushu/NNP -RRB-/NNP ./. In/IN order/NN to/TO be/VB able/JJ to/TO serve/VB this/DT beef/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP ,/, they/PRP had/VBD to/TO import/VB the/DT whole/JJ cow/NN in/IN themselves/NN instead/RB of/IN just/RB selected/JJ cuts/NNS ./. I/PRP have/VBN to/TO emphasize/VB ``/NN for/IN steaks/NNS ''/RB because/IN all/DT parts/NNS of/IN the/DT beef/NN cattle/NNS are/VBP delicious/JJ if/IN they/PRP are/VBP cooked/VBN in/IN the/DT right/JJ way/NN ./. So/RB if/IN I/PRP am/VBP thinking/VBG of/IN Cantonese/JJ style/NN stewed/VBD beef/NN ,/, then/RB the/DT brisket/NN would/MD have/VB been/VBN my/PRP$ favorite/NN cut/NN ./. But/CC when/WRB it/PRP comes/VBZ to/TO a/DT beef/NN steak/NN ,/, Ribeye/NN is/VBZ king/RB ./. In/IN fact/NN ,/, if/IN I/PRP had/VBD my/PRP$ way/NN ,/, I/PRP would/MD be/VB only/RB eating/VBG the/DT Ribeye/JJ cap/NN ,/, which/WDT the/DT Japanese/NN call/VBP ``/JJ Kaburi/NN ''/NN ./. This/DT is/VBZ the/DT thin/JJ flap/NN of/IN meat/NN around/IN the/DT rim/NN of/IN the/DT Ribeye/JJ steak/NN which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT most/NN most/NN tender/JJ and/CC flavourful/JJ part/NN of/IN the/DT whole/JJ cow/NN ./. The/DT Ribeye/NN is/VBZ essentially/RB made/VBD up/NN of/IN three/CD muscles/NNS ./. The/DT large/JJ central/NN one/CD is/VBZ the/DT longissimus/JJ dorsi/NN muscle/NN with/IN is/VBZ a/DT long/JJ muscle/NN that/IN stretches/NN down/IN the/DT back/RB of/IN the/DT cow/NN ./. There/EX are/VBP two/CD muscles/NNS that/IN constitute/JJ the/DT cap/NN ,/, viz/NNP the/DT spinalis/NN dorsi/NN and/CC multifidus/NN dorsi/NN ./. These/DT are/VBP two/CD flat/NN muscles/NN that/IN lie/NN next/JJ to/TO the/DT backbone/NN of/IN the/DT cattle/NNS and/CC are/VBP very/RB tender/JJ ,/, extremely/JJ marbled/NN and/CC very/RB flavourful/JJ ./. Some/DT chefs/NN call/VBP this/DT the/DT ``/NN butter/NN ''/NN of/IN the/DT cow/NN ./. I/PRP call/VBP it/PRP beef/NN heaven/NN ./. Because/. these/DT cuts/NNS are/VBP generally/RB quite/RB tender/JJ to/TO begin/VB with/IN ,/, most/NN Yakiniku/NNP restaurants/NN would/MD cut/VB them/PRP relatively/VB thick/NN ,/, just/RB shy/VB of/IN a/DT centimetre/NN ./. When/WRB you/PRP sink/VB your/PRP$ teeth/NN into/IN a/DT slice/NN of/IN nicely/RB grilled/VBN Ribeye/NN ,/, you/PRP will/MD be/VB rewarded/VBD with/IN a/DT burst/NN of/IN beefy/NN juices/NNS ./. Now/RB close/VB your/PRP$ eyes/NN and/CC allow/VBD the/DT aroma/NN waft/NN up/IN your/PRP$ nose/NN ,/, let/VB the/DT umami/NN flavor/NN linger/NN at/IN the/DT back/RB of/IN your/PRP$ palate/NN for/IN a/DT while/NN and/CC wash/VB it/PRP all/RB down/VB with/IN a/DT sip/NN of/IN sake/NN !/. Ah/UH .../: As/CC you/PRP move/VB down/VB the/DT back/RB of/IN the/DT cow/NN to/TO where/WRB the/DT rib/NN cage/NN ends/VBZ -LRB-/JJ 13th/NN rib/NN -RRB-/NN ,/, you/PRP get/VB to/TO the/DT Sirloin/JJ -LRB-/NN Shortloin/NN in/IN the/DT US/NNP -RRB-/NNP primal/NNP ./. This/DT cut/NN is/VBZ characterized/VBD by/IN a/DT thick/JJ layer/NN of/IN fat/NN on/IN one/CD side/NN of/IN the/DT steak/NN ./. Being/VBG a/DT non-weight/JJ bearing/NN muscle/NN ,/, this/DT is/VBZ a/DT very/RB tender/JJ cut/NN and/CC very/RB popular/JJ for/IN steaks/NNS ./. The/DT texture/NN ,/, juiciness/NN and/CC flavor/NN of/IN the/DT Sirloin/NN is/VBZ very/RB similar/JJ to/TO the/DT center/JJ part/NN of/IN the/DT Ribeye/NN because/IN it/PRP is/VBZ basically/IN the/DT continuation/NN of/IN the/DT same/JJ longissimus/NN dorsi/NN muscle/NN down/IN the/DT back/RB of/IN the/DT cow/NN ./. Contrary/JJ to/TO what/WP is/VBZ popularly/JJ believed/NN ./. The/DT Sirloin/NN is/VBZ not/RB called/VBD ``/NNP Sir/NNP ''/NNP loin/NN to/TO denote/VB its/PRP$ premium/NN status/JJ amongst/NN steaks/NNS ./. Rather/JJ ,/, it/PRP was/VBD derived/VBN from/IN the/DT old/JJ French/NN ``/NN surlonge/NN ''/NN which/WRB means/VBZ ``/NN above/IN the/DT loins/NN ''/NN ./. In/IN Singapore/NNP ,/, a/DT Sirloin/NN steak/NN usually/RB refers/VBZ to/TO the/DT Shortloin/JJ portion/NN of/IN the/DT cattle/NNS which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT portion/NN of/IN the/DT cattle/NNS between/IN the/DT ribcage/NN and/CC the/DT pelvic/JJ bone/NN ./. This/DT primal/NN is/VBZ a/DT little/JJ more/JJ confusing/NN because/IN the/DT British/NN and/CC Americans/NN define/IN their/PRP$ Sirloin/NN primal/NN differently/NN ./. The/DT Sirloin/NNP primal/NNP -LRB-/NNP US/NNP -RRB-/NNP covers/IN the/DT entire/JJ hip/NN area/NN of/IN the/DT cattle/NNS and/CC is/VBZ divided/JJ into/IN Top/JJ Sirloin/NN ,/, Bottom/NN Sirloin/NN ,/, Sirloin/NN Tip/NN and/CC Sirloin/NN Cap/NN ./. The/DT premium/NN cut/NN is/VBZ the/DT Striploin/NN which/WDT is/VBZ commonly/RB called/VBD the/DT Sirloin/NN in/IN Singapore/NNP and/CC it/PRP should/MD look/VB like/IN the/DT photo/NN above/NN ./. Some/DT restaurants/NN might/VB serve/VB Sirloin/RB Tip/JJ or/CC Top/JJ Sirloin/NN and/CC price/NN it/PRP very/RB competitively/JJ ./. These/DT are/VBP fine/JJ and/CC are/VBP perfectly/RB good/JJ meats/NNS but/CC they/PRP should/VB be/VB not/RB be/VB confused/VBD with/IN a/DT proper/JJ Sirloin/NN steak/NN ./. The/DT tenderloin/NN is/VBZ a/DT favorite/JJ amongst/NN the/DT ladies/NNS as/IN it/PRP is/VBZ the/DT most/JJ tender/JJ part/NN of/IN the/DT cow/NN and/CC usually/RB contains/RB very/RB little/JJ fat/NN ./. However/RB ,/, the/DT marbling/VBG can/MD still/RB be/VB quite/RB intense/VBD in/IN the/DT Wagyu/NN cattle/NNS as/IN you/PRP can/MD see/VB from/IN the/DT photo/NN above/NN ./. Technically/JJ ,/, this/DT is/VBZ a/DT single/JJ muscle/NN called/VBD the/DT psoas/NN major/NN and/CC because/IN it/PRP does/VBZ n't/RB do/VB much/JJ work/NN ,/, it/PRP is/VBZ very/RB tender/JJ ./. Since/CC there/RB is/VBZ only/RB 1/CD kg/NN of/IN it/PRP in/IN a/DT 500kg/JJ cattle/NNS ,/, it/PRP is/VBZ also/RB very/RB expensive/JJ ./. The/DT Tenderloin/NN is/VBZ situated/RB right/JJ next/JJ to/TO the/DT Sirloin/NN and/CC separated/NN by/IN a/DT thin/JJ bone/NN -LRB-/NN transverse/NN process/NN of/IN the/DT lumbar/JJ vertebra/NN -RRB-/NN ./. You/PRP get/VB a/DT T-Bone/NNP Steak/NNP when/WRB both/DT Sirloin/NN and/CC Tenderloin/NNS are/VBP cut/VB together/RB with/IN the/DT bone/NN ./. The/DT Tenderloin/NN gets/VBZ thicker/JJ nearer/NN to/TO the/DT rump/JJ end/NN of/IN the/DT cow/NN and/CC a/DT T-bone/JJ steak/NN cut/NN from/IN this/DT region/NN is/VBZ sometimes/RB called/VBD a/DT Porterhouse/NN steak/NN ./.
